Reviews.Title: Worth for money
Reviews.Author: arul fernandez
Reviews.Content: It is fast with 2.4 GHz processor and with 16 GB RAM we can achieve the ultimate speed. Touch screen helps the hazel of using mouse pointer. For the money we pay, it is worth each penny. It is easy to carry because of it's size and convenient to use.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the money!
Reviews.Author: Willie
Reviews.Content: I have had this for a week so far and it has performed exactly as expected. I paid extra to have a large SSD preinstalled and it was worth every penny. The laptop is very fast and the boot time is under 10 secs from a cold start. It seems like instant on from hibernation.

Reviews.Title: Top Notch
Reviews.Author: jjtarqad
Reviews.Content: I wanted a top notch laptop to work architectural graphics or pictures and this is what I got. Built to last and even so lighter than expected; with 16 GB of RAM and 64 bit OS it is faster than anything I had before; the resolution on the screen is outstanding, and the pictures really shine in there; touch screen also helps and the overall design is pleasant and good looking.I am very pleased and satisfied with ahving gotten this laptop, even if it has taken somne time and patience to adjust to the Windows 8 setup that can be blaffing sometimes. Toshiba did a great job assembling this top notch laptod.
